channel.title: Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle Earth
channel.description: I just downloaded a torrent for LOTR:BFME, mounted it with Daemon tools, but it says to insert the correct CD. I went online and got sd4hider, didn't work. Tried CureROM, didn't work. Is there a place I can just get a simple no-cd patch/crack? I have spent hours on google with no luck. I would be VERY greatful if someone could help.

item.title: Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle Earth
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Hmm, it turns out not to be a very fun game. I got the second one (damn thing is 5.44 GB), and it was better, but still not too great. Is there a castle games like that where you command troops, but you have to work on your castle, gathering resources for a few weeks instead of like 30 minutes? Like those old fish tank games where you raise fish, but for a castle + army + battles etc.?

Read full topic
item.source: Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle Earth

item.title: Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle Earth
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Go to gamecopyworld.com and get the mini image (or whatever its called)…its about 5mb and you mount it with daemon tools. Worked fine for me when I tried it out (although I borrowed it from a friend…shouldn’t make a difference though.)

Read full topic
item.source: Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle Earth

item.title: Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle Earth
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Computer games are often not even locked up(Although console games are). At walmart/other department stores it is harder to run away because the exit is much futhur. But at Staples they have lots of comuter games/accessories… Grab them and run, its very easy. That being said, I would never do it to a local shop, or a small business(they struggle to survive).

Read full topic
item.source: Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle Earth

item.title: Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle Earth
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

i know someone who can open those locks on the glass cabnet, put something like a phone or camera into a bag and be out in 5 mins,
if the guard asks to look in the bag he just runs

Read full topic
item.source: Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle Earth

item.title: Lord of the Rings: Battle for Middle Earth
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Just go to a store, open the box, and steal it(or when fagex.net is back functioning reuqest or look there and you’ll get a copy easily).

I’ve stolen from Staples countless times. You can either open the box very carefully, or if your in a different town(or in a huge city) take it and run. If you think a 16 year old girl at the countr is going to chase after you then…

Read full topic
